content: kick back relax socks designed by belinda glynn @here i knit the kick back relax socks are simple ribbed socks that extend the ribbing down the heel flap hugging the heel and creadng socks with a very relaxed very comfortable sunday-morning-in-bed vibe finished size 17 5 20 22 5 cm / 7 7 75 8 75 inches circumference yarn 1 skein 4ply/fingering weight yarn with opdonal contrast colour approximately 10 15g yarn required for contrast colour examples shown - skip rope yarn co double dutch sock in purple ponytail - jokamamo texdles pladnum sock in mint choc chip and chocolate note for top of the foot while needle 2 contains the heel and foot sdtches these socks have a ribbed heel which extends the ribbing from the leg to the heel creadng a stretchy heel that hugs the back of the foot and results in a comfortable relaxed fit however this heel is bulkier than a standard heel flap and might not fit as well into shoes and boots as other handknit socks therefore a less-bulky
